alert.note: Alert for Russell; Scott; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sullivan, central Johnson, northern Carter, Russell, southeastern Scott and Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 615 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Cleveland Va to near Elizabethton. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Lebanon, Mountain City, Cleveland Va, Walnut Hill, Bluff City and Honaker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
